name: Bubble Blast Mania
description:
bubble rescue bird, save little baby birds
Shoot bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to rescue the trapped baby birds!
Shoot colorful bubbles in this bubble mania, Randomly generated colorful bubble.
Different bird style but unlimited fun, Pop bubble to be hero.
Feel entertainment we bring to you for the whole family.
Rescue all the bird babies by popping bubbles that trap them!

How to play:
- Slide your fingers to tap the screen, make an accurate shot.
- Forming a chain reaction when shoot more same color bubbles.
- Pop many bubbles in a row to unlock special pops with unique benefits.
- Use pop Boosters when you need a helping hand in tricky levels.
- Open Gift Props if you want 3-stars Clearance.

Highlights in bird bubble rescue:
- Over 1000 Well-designed levels!
- Special pops with unique benefits.
- Beautiful graphics and animations, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!
- Super easy to pick up and challenge to master.
- You will never get bored with different level types.
- Score Big Bonuses, drop large bunches to score sweet bonuses!
- All with color in bursting.

Embark on this adventure with special pops when you are rescuing the adorable birds.

------------------------------------
Bubble Rescue Bird is suitable for everyone, for whole family.
NEW experience with dragging your finger to shoot bubbles.
